comments:
Good Day!

I'm using Eclipse 3.1.2 (tried also 3.2.M5) and I have the following problem.
I didn't add to Eclipse anything, I'm working with the archive downloaded from Eclipse website. If I just start Eclipse, go to File->New->Project, select "Java Project" and press "Next" I'm getting a message "An SWT error occured. You are recommended to exit workbench...etc.". In the .log I have this:
